title: Touhou - Shoujo-tachi no Spécialités - Spécialités Filles (Doujinshi)
description:
An anthology, with 9 stories of the Gensokyo girls presenting their own food and drinks of choice.

8. Muenzuka Sweet Pickled Ginger - Komachi gets the Three Fairies stealing ginger buds, and gives them both work and a lesson for that.

9. Baked Cheesecake and Pu-erh Tea - The Crown Prince wants to take a courtesy gift to Eientei. She initially wants to take a dessert of heavenly virtues, but ends up settling for a earthly one with probably even greater virtues.
